text: 7|35|He adama santana! Yadi tomalokara ocarata tomalokara majara paraa'i raachulasakala ahe, yisakale amara ayatasamuha tomalokara ocarata bibrta karaiba, tetiya yisakale takbaraa aralambana karaiba arau nijake sansodhana karaiba, te'omlokara kono bhaya nathakiba arau te'omloka cintita'o nahaâ€™ba.
